cluedo

Class GameOfCluedo

  • java.lang.Object
    • cluedo.GameOfCluedo

  • public class GameOfCluedo
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing the main game logic including setting up the game and then playing the game. Is then passed to the Frame class for graphical representation.
    Author:
    Aden Kenny and Simon Pope.
